cab.content: tornCirculated by the Secretary of State for India.SECRET.n. *From Viceroy, Foreign Department, II/// May 1918. (Received 15th May, i p.in.)Secret. - Weekly report. . North-West Frontier and Baluchistan quiet. Assam. Dallas committed serious raid in Darrang district kidnapping sonic 40 inhabitants. Political Officer with escort of Assam Hides permitted to visit Dalla territory on understanding this will no! lead to extension of trouble or calls for reinforcements. Military situation unchanged.
